title: Berlin, Germany
description: Join global hackathons and explore Europe’s startup capital.

title: Tokyo, Japan
description: Discover neon skylines, ancient temples, and cutting-edge innovation.

title: New York City, USA
description: The city that never sleeps, where tech, art, and culture collide.

title: Cape Town, South Africa
description: Hike Table Mountain and experience the vibrant coastal city.

title: Sydney, Australia
description: Explore the Sydney Opera House and surf famous Bondi Beach.

title: Barcelona, Spain
description: Admire Gaudí’s masterpieces and enjoy Mediterranean vibes.

title: Dubai, UAE
description: Shop futuristic malls and marvel at the Burj Khalifa skyline.

title: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
description: Dance through Carnival and soak up sunshine on Copacabana.

title: Rome, Italy
description: Walk through ancient history at the Colosseum and Vatican City.

title: Bangkok, Thailand
description: Enjoy street food, floating markets, and golden temples.

title: Paris, France
description: Stroll by the Eiffel Tower and discover world-class cuisine.

title: San Francisco, USA
description: Cross the Golden Gate Bridge and explore Silicon Valley.

title: Istanbul, Turkey
description: A bridge between Europe and Asia with rich cultural heritage.

title: Vancouver, Canada
description: Ski mountains in the morning, kayak the Pacific in the afternoon.

title: Marrakech, Morocco
description: Explore colorful souks and the magic of the desert at night.
